about_the_game:
A curse spreads from the ruined city of Santicado, leaving death and stillness in its wake. But rustling within the wreckage are survivors like Luna - a simple priestess from a distant land. Armed with the magic Moonweft Blade, she seeks the source of the curse within Santicado’s ruins. She must purge it, lest the world fall into the deepest, darkest silence…

Explore Santicado


Silent Santicado is a 2D action adventure game that spans an interconnected world of rain soaked forests, cursed ruins, and salt washed shores. Explore overgrown ruins, encounter a cast of peculiar characters, and defeat a menagerie of twisted enemies as you search for the source of Santicado's curse.

Take in a rich setting and mysterious story while also enjoying intense combat. Use melee combos, enchanted trinkets, and a variety of spells to defeat the dark creatures that lurk within Santicado. Between battles, jump and climb your way through the ruins while interacting with various characters, each with their own reason for being in the ruined city.

A Beautifully Ruined World


Silent Santicado is rendered through detailed pixel art that evokes a traditional illustrative art style. Every corner of the world is rich with detail and crawling with twisted and unusual creatures.

You'll find new abilities on your journey that open up more of the world to you, allowing you to delve even further into the decaying heart of Santicado. Chart your own course through its decrepit buildings and vermin-infested caverns as you search for the source of the curse. Whichever path you take, an exciting journey awaits you in Silent Santicado!


Game Features

  • Stylish art and animations
  • A cast of unique characters - allies and enemies alike
  • Charge up your sword by striking enemies, and use that energy to empower your attacks or heal your wounds
  • A rich world filled with secrets and mysteries
  • Exciting combat with combos, dodges, and spells
  • Multiple bosses await, each with their own attack patterns
  • A compelling story told through character interactions, item descriptions, and the world itself
  • Customize the look of the game with dozens of unlockable palettes
  • Scour every corner for secret items and hidden lore

content_descriptors.notes:
This game contains content that may not be appropriate for all ages, namely:
- Frequent Depictions of Violence
- Large Quantities of Blood
